nodes.text: Finhead Stonebone's pirate gang was a loose-knit organization of thieves, smugglers, and gangsters led by pirate Finhead Stonebone.
While attacking Captain Gruna's ore hauler, they were captured by Enforcer One of Bogga the Hutt, who was paid to protect Gruna.
Bogga later commissioned the Stonebone and his pirates to fetch a priceless cache of Adegan crystals from Jedi Master Thon on Ambria.
